findings.title: Owner can change tax and liquidity fee
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify tax and liquidity fees.

findings.title: Owner can change maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or transactions from the fee.

findings.title: Owner can change minimum and maximum token number to send
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify the minimum and maximum token numbers that can be sent.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from max transaction restriction
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain transactions from the maximum transaction amount restriction.

findings.title: Owner can change reward cycle block
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the reward cycle block.

findings.title: Owner can activate contract preset
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to activate the contract preset.

findings.title: Owner can change marketing expenses and dev addresses
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify marketing expenses and developer addresses.

findings.title: Owner can disable reflection fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to disable the reflection fee.

findings.title: Owner can transfer contract token balance to another address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to transfer the contract's token balance to any other address.

findings.title: Owner can change threshHoldTopUpRate value
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the threshHoldTopUpRate value, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can transfer contract BNB balance to another address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to transfer the contract's BNB balance to any other address.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to lock and unlock, which could allow them to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.
